text: Dorothy Malone (January 29, 1924 â€“ January 19, 2018)Dorothy Malone, Star of TV's Peyton Place, Dies t 93 was an American actress. She won an Academy Award for her role in Written on the Wind. She also starred in the famous soap opera Peyton Place in the 1960s. == Personal life == Malone died on January 19, 2018 in Dallas, Texas of natural causes at the age of 93. == References == == Other websites == * *Dorothy Malone photo gallery *Dorothy Malone at AllMovie.com Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:1924 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Dorothy Malone
